summary: Most frontend wheel/game-flow requirements appear implemented (SVG circular 4-section wheel with fixed pointer; smooth spin animation landing on backend outcome; balance cache update from backend result; outcome toasts/effects gating). Backend spinWheel changes cannot be verified from the provided truncated backend diff. Several unrelated admin/payment/UI enhancements were added beyond the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added state migration module and applied migration logic to backend actor, including introducing `lastSpinResult` into user profile state.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for migrations or schema evolution; only requested updating `spinWheel()` behavior and payouts.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin Wheel Configuration page for managing house edge settings.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested creating/admin UI for house edge configuration.

hallucinated_features.description: Manual payment/Buy Credits UI enhancements including QR dialog/image resolution and expanded payment request tracking UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is about the spin wheel game behavior; it explicitly lists withdrawals as a non-goal and does not request buy-credits/payment UI changes.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query policy changes (staleTime/refetch behavior) and additional cache update behavior for profile data beyond the spin/balance requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; only needed spin flow and balance updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated animated balance display component (BalanceTicker) and multiple premium UI redesign changes across non-game pages (Wallet/Transactions/Profile/etc).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of the wheel implementation requirements.
